title: ShoppIt
description: A small scale and a simple e-commerce applications built including features like JWT Authentication & Verification, CRUD Operations, Cart Management and  Payment Integration.

title: Image Forgery Detector
description: A Deep Learning Web Applications for detecting whether an Image is Real or Tampered, it also gives us the Accuracy with which the Model prediction might be True/False.

title: Youtube Blogger AI
description: This is a Youtube Video Summarization Full Stack Web Application platform which summarizes the content in the form of BLOGS and records it for each individual Users.

title: EfficienSee
description: An Employee-HR Dashboard platform which streamlines work processes and empowers Employees & HR to efficiently manages different Tasks, Leaves and Personal Data of Employees.

title: KishanSarthak
description: The Digital platform for Dairy and Poultry farmers which enables farmers to direct sell product to businesses, eliminating 3rd-party involvement. Thus bridging the gap between Farmers & Market and Empowering them.
